thread.title: Flume Announces Skin Companion II EP
thread.title_full: Flume Announces Skin Companion II EP

author: Sheldon Pearce
title: Flume Announces Skin Companion II EP
text:
Flume Announces Skin Companion II EP The second follow-up to the 2016 album is out February 17 Flume Photo by Mark Metcalfe/Getty Images 
Flume has announced the second companion EP to his 2016 album, Skin . It’s out February 17 via Mom + Pop , and will be available on vinyl on May 5. Like the first companion EP , this one features new music taken from the Skin recording sessions. Check out snipped of the four tracks below. The first companion EP was released in November. Skin featured Beck , Vince Staples , Tove Lo , and more. In December, Flume enlisted Staples and fellow Skin guest Kučka for a cover of Ghost Town DJs’ 1996 hit “My Boo.” Artists In This Story
